name: The House Of Night Series Multiple Choice Quiz | Authors | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the name of Zoey's first boyfriend?
questions.explanation:
Heath Luck.

	Heath is her human boyfriend throughout the series.  Erik was her second boyfriend, who is also a student at the House of Night.  Loren Blake is a professor at the school.  Damien Maslin is one of Zoey's best friends.  He is also gay.

Jack Twist.

	Jack Twist comes to the school in the second book.  Like Damien, he is gay.  He joined Zoey's circle of friends after he got together with Damien.

questions.text: Which school group is Zoey made the leader of at the end of the first book?
questions.explanation:
Dark Daughters.

	After Aphrodite calls up evil spirits during the Samhain ritual, Zoey uses her affinity with the elements to send them away.  Then Neferet arrives and makes her the leader of the Dark Daughters.

questions.text: Who is the High Priestess, and Zoey's mentor?
questions.explanation:
Neferet.

	Zoey likes Neferet at first, but finds out in Book Three that she is evil.  Kayla is Zoey's ex-best friend.  Erin and Shaunee are two of her current best friends.  They are nicknamed the Twins because their thoughts are so alike.

questions.text: What does Zoey name her cat?
questions.explanation:
Nala.

	Nala chose Zoey, who got a feeling that she should name the cat Nala.  Skylar is Neferet's cat.  Drew and Elizabeth are two minor characters.

questions.text: Zoey nicknamed her step-dad the Step-Monster.
questions.explanation:
False.

	She actually nicknamed him the Step-Loser.  There is a funny scene in the third book where Grandma Redbird calls him a turd-monkey.

Lenobia.

	Neferet teaches Vamp Sociology.  Professor Nolan is the drama teacher, and Loren Blake is the Vamp Poet Laureate.

questions.text: Stevie Rae has an affinity for Spirit.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Stevie Rae has an affinity for Earth.  Zoey has an affinity for all of the elements, including Spirit.

questions.text: What are the names of the two Union football players who were killed by the undead creatures?
questions.explanation:
Chris Ford and Brad Higeons.

	Chris and Brad were found with slash marks all over their body.  They died from loss of blood as a result.  Heath almost died the same way, but Zoey managed to save him because of their Imprint.

questions.text: What competition did Erik win in Book Three?
questions.explanation:
Shakespearean Monologue Competition.

	Erik is very good at Monologues, and has won the competition twice in a row.  This year it was held in Europe.  Zoey missed him terribly while he was gone.
